vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Ἰωάνης (Rec. ννης, which see; cf. Dalman, Gr., 142; Tdf., Pr., 79; WH, App., 159; Bl., §3, 10; 10, 2), -ου, dative, -ῃ (but in Mat.11:4. Luk.7:18, 22 Rev.1:1, ει), accusative, -ην, ὁ (Heb. יוֹחָנָן, LXX: Ἰωανάν, 2Ch.23:1, al.; -ννάν, Je 47 (40):8, al., Aq.), Hellenized form of Ἰωανάν,
John ( I Est.8:38(41)*), viz.,
__1. John the Baptist: Mat.3:1, al.
__2. John the Apostle, son of Zebedee: Mat.4:21, Mrk.1:19, Luk.5:10, Act.1:13, al.
__3. The father of St. Peter: Jhn.1:43 21:15-17.
__4. John surnamed Mark: Act.12:12, 25 13:5, 13 15:37.
__5. The writer of the Apocalypse, traditionally identified with 2: Rev.1:1, 4 9.
Ἰωάννης (D, Ἰωνάθας; see MM, Exp., XV; Bl., §10, 2), ὁ,
John: Act.4:6 13:5, Tr., WH, Rev.22:8 (cf. Ἰωάνης).†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.3.1;
son of: Zechariah (G2197H) and Elizabeth (G1665)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: Juan: (1) el Bautista ; (2) hijo de Zebedeo, uno de los doce ; (3) autor de Apocalipsis ; (4) Juan Marco ; (5) padre de Pedro y Andrés ; (6) miembro del concilio judío (HCH.4:6)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約翰 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華是恩慈的給予者"
1) 施洗約翰
2) 使徒約翰
3) 名為馬可的約翰,是保羅與巴拿巴的傳道同伴(徒 12:12)
4) 公會裡的一員(徒 4:6)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
约翰这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是"耶和华是恩慈的给予者"
1) 施洗约翰
2) 使徒约翰
3) 名为马可的约翰,是保罗与巴拿巴的传道同伴(徒12:12)
4) 公会里的一员(徒4:6)
vocabinfos._vi_Definition: Giăng « Đức Chúa Trời là Đấng ân huệ » Xem H3110

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.4.21;
son of: Zebedee (G2199);
brother of: James (G2385); also called Boanerges at Mrk.3.17;
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Act.4.6

vocabinfos.mediumDef: A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.12.12; his mother was Mary (G3137L); also called John at Act.12.12,25; 13.5,13; 15.37;

vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Ἰωνᾶς, -ᾶ, ὁ (Heb. יוֹנָה),
Jonah, the prophet: Mat.12:39-41 16:4, Luk.11:29-30, 32.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.16.17;
father of: Peter (G4074) and Andrew (G0406); also called Jonah (KJV: Jona) at Mat.16.17;
vocabinfos._es_Definition: Jonás: (1) profeta del AT ; (2) padre de Pedro y Andrés
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約拿 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "鴿子"
1) 舊約先知
2) 西門彼得與安德烈的父親
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
约拿 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "鸽子"
1) 旧约先知
2) 西门彼得与安德烈的父亲
